lines.text: By whose order do you assume this authority?
By whose order do you question it?
I see nothing unusual - the best reason to be watchful.

[Referring to Nantaquas]
This rogue means to kill you.
It's plain he has no love for me.

[Referring to Smith's marriage to Pocahantas]
It's sacrilege for John Smith to do this thing!
May hap, my friend, but it'll be most pleasant on a cold night.

[Referring to Pocahantas]
Women! What's bothering the queer little creature now?

[to Rolfe]
You scratch at your worries as a dog has fleas.
